this_title: Stories from the Dark Earth: Meet the Ancestors Revisited
introduction: Archaeologist Julian Richards returns to some of his most important digs to discover how science, conservation and new finds have changed our understanding of entire eras of ancient history.Pagans of Roman Britain1/4 Julian Richards goes back to the excavation of two burials from Roman Britain.Families of the Stone Age2/4 Archaeologist Julian Richards returns to the excavation of two burials from the Stone Age.Sacred Women of the Iron Age3/4 Julian Richards returns to the excavation of two very different Iron Age women.The First Anglo-Saxons4/4 Julian Richards returns to the excavation of two early Anglo-Saxon cemeteries.
chinese_title: Stories from the Dark Earth: Meet the Ancestors Revisited
